published_attributes.title: Table of Contents
published_attributes.serialized_body:
In this part you will:

  • Learn how to add gestures and interact with UI
  • Navigate between view controllers
  • Create and populate collection views
  • Create basic animations for the views
  • Use the scroll view
  • Learn about View Controller lifecycle
  • Multithreading

blocks.text: Learn how to add gestures and interact with UI
Create basic animations for the views

published_attributes.title: Lecture 12
published_attributes.serialized_body:
Slides

Topic before 33 minute is about Drag & Drop and it’s optional to watch.

  1. UITableView (p. 596)
  2. UICollectionView
  3. UITextField

Links you may useful:

Navigation controllers overview

Delete cells from UITableView with swap

How to add UISearchController

Search bar in navigation bar

Search bar guide

Quick navigation search bar guide

How to customise search bar

🎉  You are doing great. Now you can learn about MVVM and try to implement it in the second task!
